title: Avenge the Drowned
content:
pse was retrieved by Grey Harbour fishers - they might know more about the beast that killed her Flood Tide Allandra Grey bid us avenge Holli, a fallen Waveservant of Umberlee. She was killed by a noxious, polluting beast around Greyhour - must find it and slay master.

Search Flymm's Cargo for the beast's master

Grey Harbour's fisherfolk saw something huge underwater when Holi died. It went underneath Flynn's Cargo - we should take a look.

Explore the basement of Flymm's Cargo.

Flymm's Cargo
